thread.title: Eric LeGrand fulfilling 'purpose' as fundraiser tops $105K total
thread.title_full: Eric LeGrand fulfilling 'purpose' as fundraiser tops $105K total

author: app.com
title: Eric LeGrand fulfilling 'purpose' as fundraiser tops $105K total
text:
MORE BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP Sometimes Eric LeGrand thinks about how, under a different set of circumstances, he could be playing his fourth season in the NFL right now.
And then a story like the one he heard Thursday night – about a 10-year-old girl who wrote about him for a school assignment on heroes – inevitably reminds LeGrand of his unique place in the world.
“I see stuff like that and it’s like, ‘Wow, this is what my purpose is. This is my role,’” LeGrand said. “I’m helping out a little girl who might have no idea who I am if I was in the NFL.
“But I’m her hero and she sees how even her dad is inspired by me. That’s the daddy-daughter relationship and that’s special. And I’m just a 25-year-old kid just trying to live the dream.”
The third annual “An Evening With Eric LeGrand” hosted Thursday by Newroads Financial Group raised about $38,000 for Team LeGrand of the Christopher Reeve Foundation.
